setlanguage.description: Change the language of the commands, thus simpler for your members to interact with me!
setlanguage.error: Inform me correct language! options: {{- languages }}

setprefix.description: Place a custom prefix for the commands on your server, but be sure to notify your server members about this new prefix! üòâ
setprefix.error: Type a valid prefix! **[{{max}}]** character limit.

settimer.description: Hours are very different in various places in the world, for this there is this command, you can change the time of your server, this will only influence the aesthetics of the places, leaving them with periods of day and night!
settimer.success: \‚è∞ Guild time has been updated successfully!

ping.description: Bot connection data with the servers.

active.missing: You do not have this item!

box.description: Open your boxes and win prizes!
box.noBox: You do not have this box or it is not active!
box.empty: You do not have any active box.

buy.noMoney: You don't have enough money to buy this item!

disable.description: Deactivate an item and put it back in your inventory.

inventory.description: View your inventory or that of another user!

hour.description: Look the current time following the configuration of this guild!

team.description: Team that develops the bot, and makes it increasingly amazing!

calculate.description: Calculate price to upgrade your storage!

collect.description: To collect all your resources produced
collect.cooldown: Your production is not ready yet, wait `{{ min }} minutes` to collect again.
collect.attacked:
**Your plantation has been attacked by birds and wildlife!
His loss was ``{{- attack }}%``!**
collect.full: Some of your storages are full! Empty to collect your new resources.

fish.description: Catch fish or treasures with your fishing rod and some baits!

sell.description: Sale what was produced to make money
sell.noStorage: You not have resources for sale!

storage.description: Increase the levels of a storage
storage.noMoney: You enough money to buy this upgrade! Missing: `{{- remainder }}`.

table.description: View a complete table of resource prices and upgrades
table.sell:
**__Formula__**: Amount {{- operation }} by {{- value }}
**__Example__**: {{- emoji }} = {{- amount }} üí∞ = {{- money }}
table.calculate:
To know the price of several levels, use:
**{{- prefix }}calculate <initial level> <final level>**

upgrade.description: To upgrade the level of a place
upgrade.maxLevel: You already at the maximum level at this place
upgrade.noMoney: you enough money to buy this upgrade! Missing: {{- remainder }}
upgrade.protection:
\üå≥ Congratulations your Farm is growing, but it attracts attention from unwanted animals, your plantation can be attacked while you are away! 

Buy protection using command ``market``, prices are in command ``list``

unlock.fishing: Congratulations, you have unlocked a new location! Now get your fishing rod and let's go fishing! \‚õµ
unlock.mining: Congratulations, you have unlocked a new location! Now get your pick and let's go mining! \‚õè

daily.description: Lilistars you can catch every 20 hours! You can buy special things with these Lilistars.
daily.cooldown: Daily bonus has already been redeemed! wait `{{- time }}` to take again.
daily.broke: Broken streak! You have not redeemed the daily for more than 2 days.

vote.description: Earn Lilistars by voting for the bot! These Lilistars can be spent buying products or boosters in the market!
vote.cooldownMessage: lilistars per vote has already been redeemed! wait `{{- time }}` to take again.
vote.noVoted:
\üíñ vote for me and retype this command, you will earn Lilistars to spend on the ``market`` command, more product details use the ``list`` command, you can earn this reward every 13 hours!
https://botsparadiscord.xyz/bots/548862902078275605/votar
vote.success: \üëç successfully voted, thanks for your support!

days.description: See the effects of the weathers they will cause in your production.
days.note: `Note:` **The weather forecasts are `fictitious`, created to be used inside the Bot.**
days.increase: will increase {{- value }}% in your production.
days.decrease: will decrease {{- value }}% in your production.

months.description: Look duration of the seasons and the effects it has on your production.
months.title: __**SEASONS**__
months.duration:
**January, May and September, it's ``Spring``.
February, June and October, it's ``Summer``.
March, June and November, it's ``Autumn``.
April, August and December, it's ``Winter``.

All season dates are ``fictitious``, created to be used inside the Bot.**
months.increase: will increase {{- value }}% in your production.
months.decrease: will decrease {{- value }}% in your production.

weather.description: Weather forecasts for today and tomorrow.
